Package wtf.choco.arrows.registry

Class ArrowRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtf.choco.arrows.registry.ArrowRegistry
  • public final class ArrowRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A registration class that holds information about AlchemicalArrow implementations as well as their in-world representations, AlchemicalArrowEntity
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - 2008Choco

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArrowRegistry

        public ArrowRegistry()

    • Method Detail

      • registerCustomArrow

        public static void registerCustomArrow​(AlchemicalArrow arrow)
        Register a custom AlchemicalArrow implementation. All arrows must be registered here in order to be recognised by AlchemicalArrows when shooting custom arrows. The provided instance must have a unique key (Keyed.getKey()), as well as a unique, non-null ItemStack of type Material.ARROW
        Parameters:
        arrow - the arrow implementation to register
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If ItemStack parameter is not of type Material.ARROW, or if a registered arrow is already using the ItemStack provided

      • unregisterCustomArrow

        public static void unregisterCustomArrow​(AlchemicalArrow arrow)
        Unregister an AlchemicalArrow implementation from the arrow registry. Note that upon unregistration, the arrow will no longer be recognised when attempting to shoot one
        Parameters:
        arrow - the arrow to unregister

      • unregisterCustomArrow

        public static void unregisterCustomArrow​(java.lang.Class<? extends AlchemicalArrow> arrowClass)
        Unregister an AlchemicalArrow implementation from the arrow registry based upon its class. Note that upon unregistration, the arrow will no longer be recognised when attempting to shoot one
        Parameters:
        arrowClass - the class of the arrow to unregister

      • getCustomArrow

        public static <T extends AlchemicalArrow> T getCustomArrow​(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Get the registered instance of the provided AlchemicalArrow class. The registration instance provides various informational methods such as its representing ItemStack as well as a method to construct a new instance of the AlchemicalArrowEntity such that an instance of Arrow is provided
        Type Parameters:
        T - the alchemical arrow class type
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the AlchemicalArrow whose registration to get
        Returns:
        the registered AlchemicalArrow. null if none

      • getCustomArrow

        public static AlchemicalArrow getCustomArrow​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack arrowItem)
        Get the registered instance of an AlchemicalArrow represented by the provided ItemStack. The registration instance provides various informational methods such as its representing ItemStack as well as a method to construct a new instance of the AlchemicalArrowEntity such that an instance of Arrow is provided
        Parameters:
        arrowItem - the item of the AlchemicalArrow instance to retrieve
        Returns:
        the registered AlchemicalArrow represented by the provided ItemStack. null if none

      • getCustomArrow

        public static AlchemicalArrow getCustomArrow​(java.lang.String key)
        Get the registered instance of an AlchemicalArrow according to its registered name. The registration instance provides various informational methods such as its representing ItemStack as well as a method to construct a new instance of the AlchemicalArrowEntity such that an instance of Arrow is provided
        Parameters:
        key - the registered NamespacedKey of the AlchemicalArrow instance to retrieve
        Returns:
        the registered AlchemicalArrow represented by the provided ItemStack. null if none

      • getRegisteredCustomArrows

        public static java.util.Set<AlchemicalArrow> getRegisteredCustomArrows()
        Get the registry for all instances of AlchemicalArrows
        Returns:
        the arrow registration data

      • clearRegisteredArrows

        public static void clearRegisteredArrows()
        Clear all registry data. This will remove all data previously registered by AlchemicalArrows and by plugins that have registered their own arrows

      • addAlchemicalArrow

        public void addAlchemicalArrow​(AlchemicalArrowEntity arrow)
        Add an AlchemicalArrowEntity to the in-world alchemical arrow tracker. If an AlchemicalArrowEntity has not been added through the use of this method, it will not be recognised by the plugin. Upon invocation of the AlchemicalArrow.createNewArrow(Arrow) method, this method should be invoked to add the returned instance
        Parameters:
        arrow - the arrow to register

      • removeAlchemicalArrow

        public void removeAlchemicalArrow​(AlchemicalArrowEntity arrow)
        Remove an AlchemicalArrowEntity from the in-world alchemical arrow tracker

        NOTE: This will prepare the arrow for deletion, not immediately delete it. The purgeArrows() method must be invoked, every tick by the plugin, to remove it from the tracker entirely.

        Parameters:
        arrow - the arrow to unregister

      • removeAlchemicalArrow

        public void removeAlchemicalArrow​(org.bukkit.entity.Arrow arrow)
        Remove an Arrow (subsequently, its related AlchemicalArrowEntity) from the in-world alchemical arrow tracker

        NOTE: This will prepare the arrow for deletion, not immediately delete it. The purgeArrows() method must be invoked, every tick by the plugin, to remove it from the tracker entirely.

        Parameters:
        arrow - the Arrow entity to unregister

      • removeAlchemicalArrow

        public void removeAlchemicalArrow​(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Remove an Arrow's UUID (subsequently, its related AlchemicalArrowEntity) from the in-world alchemical arrow tracker

        NOTE: This will prepare the arrow for deletion, not immediately delete it. The purgeArrows() method must be invoked, every tick by the plugin, to remove it from the tracker entirely.

        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID of the arrow to unregister

      • getAlchemicalArrow

        public AlchemicalArrowEntity getAlchemicalArrow​(org.bukkit.entity.Arrow arrow)
        Get an in-world AlchemicalArrowEntity tracked by the plugin
        Parameters:
        arrow - the arrow from which to get an instance
        Returns:
        an instance of the in-world AlchemicalArrowEntity associated with the arrow

      • getAlchemicalArrow

        public AlchemicalArrowEntity getAlchemicalArrow​(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Get an in-world AlchemicalArrowEntity tracked by the plugin
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID from which to get an instance
        Returns:
        an instance of the in-world AlchemicalArrowEntity associated with the arrow

      • isAlchemicalArrow

        public boolean isAlchemicalArrow​(org.bukkit.entity.Arrow arrow)
        Check whether an Arrow is being tracked as an AlchemicalArrowEntity or not
        Parameters:
        arrow - the arrow to check
        Returns:
        true if being tracked, false otherwise

      • isAlchemicalArrow

        public boolean isAlchemicalArrow​(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Check whether an Arrow's UUID is being tracked as an AlchemicalArrowEntity or not
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID to check
        Returns:
        true if being tracked, false otherwise

      • getAlchemicalArrows

        public java.util.Collection<AlchemicalArrowEntity> getAlchemicalArrows()
        Get an immutable Collection of all tracked arrows from the plugin
        Returns:
        all registered AlchemicalArrowEntities

      • clearAlchemicalArrows

        public void clearAlchemicalArrows()
        Clear all tracked in-world arrows from the map

      • getArrowsToPurge

        public int getArrowsToPurge()
        Get the amount of arrows awaiting to be purged
        Returns:
        the amount of arrows to be purged

      • purgeArrows

        public void purgeArrows()
        Remove all arrows from the tracker that were prepared for removal
